title: Himi 51
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
’E ifi pea ongo mai
Ki he kakai kotoa pē,
‘A e me’alea lahi
‘A e ‘Āngelo mālohi.
2.
Pea ‘u’ulu mālohi
‘A e ngaahi mana lahi
‘O ne haehae hake
‘A e ngaahi tanu ‘anga.
3.
Pea mafahifahi ai
‘a e ngaahi kelekele,
Pea pule ki he tahi
Ke ne toe tuku hake.
4.
Pea ‘e toki ‘ohake
‘E he tahi ‘ene mate,
Pea ‘e ‘ikai kei fūfū
‘Ene mate ‘e he efu.
5.
Ko e kakai angahala
Te nau hiki honau ‘ulu,
Pea mōmōu mai, ke sio
Ki he fu’u luo ko heli.
6.
Ka ko kitautolu, ‘oku
Tau fakahā ‘a e ‘Eiki,
‘O fai angatonu ma’u pē
‘O a’u ki he iku’anga.
7. Tau tu’u ‘i he angatonu
‘A hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū,
‘O hangē ko e makatu’u
‘O e maka ta’engta. *
